alert.note: Alert for Loudon; McMinn; Meigs; Rhea; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 2:28PM CDT until June 05 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rhea County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Loudon County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Meigs County in east Tennessee... North central McMinn County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 327 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fairview, or 10 miles northwest of Sweetwater, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kingston, Rockwood, Loudon, Fairview, Midtown, Harriman, Philadelphia, Paint Rock, Eagle Furnace and Murray Store. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 341 and 350. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 67 and 71. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
